Cuerpo: I am particularly interested in the emergence of self-organization and adaptive principles, the scaling problem in learning and in methods for coupling learning and simulated evolution. Currently, I am working on a scalable Genetic Programming system called Adaptive Representation through Learning . I'm constantly contaminated with steadfast encouragement and unbounded enthusiasm from my advisor, Prof. Dana Ballard Research Publications Recent Work Justinian P. Rosca, Dana H. Ballard.
